722900.name: Defense Clicker - Supporter Pack
722900.description:
This DLC is only for the players which want to support us to make the game better and bigger.
Supporters which are in the highscores get in the ingame highscores a yellow entry highlighting.
As an bonus you also get:
+150k base goldstorage
+ 5% more primes from bosses
+ 5% more bosssouls from bosses

If you have both supporter packs, you get both extras and extra 100k goldstorage as a thanks for supporting us

Caution:
If you already have the Supporter Pack 2 or you buy it later, the highlighting will be overwritten with the highlighting color of the higher supporter package
722900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
